medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior to admission with abdominal pain primarily in the RLQ that has increased in intensity over the course of the day. The patient has experienced some chills but denies fever, and has had a few episodes of diarrhea.
